name: Neeraj Chopra
info: Neeraj Chopra is an Indian track and field athlete who competes in the javelin throw. He won a gold medal at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, becoming the first Indian to win an Olympic gold medal in athletics.

name: Manu Bhaker
info: Manu Bhaker is an Indian shooter who specializes in pistol events. She won gold medals in both the 10m air pistol and the 25m pistol events at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

name: PV Sindhu
info: P.V. Sindhu is an Indian badminton player and an Olympic medalist. She won silver at the 2016 Rio Olympics and bronze at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.

name: Hima Das
info: Hima Das is an Indian sprinter known for her performances in the 400 meters. She became the first Indian woman to win a gold medal at the IAAF World U20 Championships in 2018.

name: Mary Kom
info: Mary Kom is an Indian boxer and a six-time world champion. She is also an Olympic bronze medalist, making her one of the most decorated female athletes in boxing.

name: Saina Nehwal
info: Saina Nehwal is an Indian badminton player who has won numerous international titles, including the bronze medal at the 2012 London Olympics.
